title: Was Ryder from Grand Theft Auto San Andreas based off of Eazy-E? - Quora

response.answer_text: It seems as if the Grove Street OGs are based on NWA. Carl seems based off of Dr. Dre, and Sweet seems based off of MC Ren. In addition to that, one of the Balla sprites (the fatter one) appears to represent Ice Cube, possibly alluding to the fact that Ice Cube left NWA. Despite this, I don’t believe it has been officially confirmed to be true.
